version_description:
- General: Minor UI fixes and improvements
- Job Detail: Now shows Custom Fields if sent by server
- Job Detail: Now shows Greeter info if sent by server
- Job Detail: Now shows pickup day of week
- Messages: Minor functional enhancements

- Job Detail: Can now see Flight Info for Stops
- Job Detail: Can now edit Custom Fields if supported by server
- Job Detail: Support for showing additional pricing fields
- Support for showing distances in miles or kilometers
- Slightly reduced app size by removing unused content
- Reduced third-party geocoding usage
- Miscellaneous minor bug fixes
- Minor UI enhancements
- Improved stability
- Improved behavior when server is unavailable
- Driver World: Support for showing next schedule on logout
- Driver World: Support for enhanced schedule functions (add, edit, delete)
- Driver Clock: Support for submitting Lunch and Break times

- Fixed inability to do Conditional and Destination book when using Auto-BookIn
- Added support for feature to show a document (eg. Waybill/Permit) button at top-left of Job Detail
- On Job Detail, now shows a comma between the Passenger Last Name and First Name
- Improved appearance of several screens on iPhone X and similar devices
- Added support for feature to confirm job status update a certain number of minutes before pickup
- Added support for feature to send active job info when submitting GPS
- Other minor bug and UI fixes and enhancements
